hours_text:
Women & Their Work is a visual and performing arts organization located in Austin that serves as a catalyst for new ideas in contemporary art created by women living and working in Texas and beyond. Women & Their Work fosters the artistic growth of women artists by encouraging them to make new, adventurous work and develops audiences for whom contemporary art is meaningful. Our mission is to ensure that women artists are represented in all forms of art.

****Hours:**** Tuesday – Friday 10-6 pm & Saturday 12 – 6pm  
****Mailing Address:**** 1311 E. Cesar Chavez, Austin, TX 78703[  
](http://web.archive.org/web/20251020084930/https://maps.google.com/?q=1710+Lavaca+Street,+Austin,+TX+78701&entry=gmail&source=g)****Phone:**** [512-477-1064](http://web.archive.org/web/20251020084930/tel:512-477-1064)  
****Email:**** [[email protected]](/web/20251020084930/https://womenandtheirwork.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#8be2e5ede4cbfce4e6eee5eae5efffe3eee2f9fce4f9e0a5e4f9ec)

****Instagram:****[@womenandtheirwork](http://web.archive.org/web/20251020084930/https://www.instagram.com/womenandtheirwork/?hl=en)

Admission to Women & Their Work is **free.** Donations are appreciated.

****Group Visits:****

Women & Their Work offers engaging and interactive tours for a variety of audiences with our friendly and knowledgeable staff. Please book your tour at least two weeks in advance during gallery hours by filling out this [tour request form](http://web.archive.org/web/20251020084930/https://wo...

# Bold About Art

Women & Their Work is a nonprofit arts organization located in Austin that serves as a catalyst for contemporary art created by women living and working in Texas and beyond. For 47 years, Women & Their Work has brought groundbreaking art to Austin, with exhibitions, performances, and educational programs. 

[Learn More](/web/20260109182514/https://womenandtheirwork.org/mission-histor...
